## Logistic Regression Benchmark:
```{r}
cv_lr(df)

# Accuracy: 60% (sd 0.12)}
```

## Random Forest (Regression) Benchmark:
```{r}
cv_rf_reg(df)
# Log Loss: 0.675 (sd 0.11)
# Accuracy: 62.4% (sd 0.12)
```

## Random Forest (Classification) Benchmark:
```{r}

# Log Loss: 0.672 (sd 0.11)
# Accuracy: 62.5% (sd 0.12)
```
